metadata.title: Opportunities for health care professionals in Northern Alberta
metadata.creator: Northern Alberta Development Council
metadata.description: At head of title: Northern Alberta Development Council

Contains a description of northern Alberta and its people, a summary of the region's future needs for health care professionals and a list of employment incentives and programs applicable to northern Alberta. Contains 31 profiles on northern Alberta communities which have major health care facilities, giving essential information on health care employers as well as a description of each community and its recreational facilities and activities
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found.
